A stack of books:
After the death of Solina, her students came together at the monastery, shut the door, stopped communicating with the outside world and began to create his own. Since then, the kingdom Elmoreden not stop the revolt and storms. So there was an underground community called Embryo, which had a huge impact in some parts the continent. Kingdom Elmoreden after Emperor Frinteza made ​​a pact with evil spirits, and went to the Tomb of the Empire, was destroyed. So fell into oblivion first United Kingdom of people.
